summary: Resizing the separate WebConsole window to its smallest size render UI issues

assigned_to_detail.name: nobody@mozilla.org
assigned_to_detail.real_name: Nobody; OK to take it and work on it

comments.text:
[Affected versions]:
- 62.0a1 (2018-06-03)

[Affected platforms]:
- Windows 10 x64

[Steps to reproduce]:
1. Launch Firefox.
2. Go to Developer Tools.
3. Activate WebConsole.
4. Go to Customize Dev Tools and set the console to Separate Window.
5. Resize the window to the smallest size possible.

[Expected result]:
- Resizing the size of the Console Window should not create any UI issues.

[Actual result]:
- Resizing the Separate console window renders the FF logo to overlap the minimize window button. 

[Regression range]:
- This issue is not a regression.

[Other Notes]:

Hovering over the minimize button while this issue occurs while render a broken animation to spill out of its designated place.
